name: Bloodbath
description: Get ready to compete in the most brutal sport of the moment. In the Dog Eat Dog tournament, you should avail yourself of your ruthless fighting skills and crush your enemies if you want to make your way to victory. Fight alone or with friends, compete in multiple stages and game modes, and improve your favorite fighter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 / AMD® Athlon™ 64 x2 or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 8800 GTS / AMD® Radeon™ HD 3850 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: For $20 I think I'd have a better time lighting myself on fire...

What to call this game? A weird fighting game with no intro? A beat-em-up with your buddies? A cry for help from the developers? Yep  Pro: Fun in a thrown into a pit with a bunch of insane killers with no clue on what to do type of game Strange in a fun way Variety of options Low system specs Steam cards & achieves Single & multi player (beat the crap out of your buddies) Can be found in bundles  Con: A FREAKING INTO WOULD BE NICE ! Overpriced 4 other people on the planet play it Unbalanced  Overall: 5/10 (-1 price, -1 unbalanced, -1 no demo - intro - training, +1 fun, +1 weird) = 4/10  If your looking for a weird fighter and want to put a lot of time in to get to know the game, and have some budies that want to do that as well .... this is a great fun WTF is going on type of game. If your just looking to get some punches in on a buddy in a legally acceptable way this is not what your looking for.  This needs a thumbs sideways rating, but that's not an option.  Do I like it? Yes Will I play it again? Yes Will I put the time in I need to to get good at this game? No Would I tell a buddy to pay full price for this game? F No  So I guess it's thumbs down. But try it out i you can find it cheap or in a bundle.
Wow.  Con: The game. Pro: Didn't have to wait much time for the cards.
